Report Model Performance

Assesses the performance of space, remMap, and spacemap models against a known truth by reporting power and false discovery rate.

reportPerf(fitParCor, trueParCor, YY = TRUE, tol = 1e-06, verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

fitParCor

A numeric matrix encoding the fitted model parameter estimates.
trueParCor

A numeric matrix encoding the true model parameters.
YY

A logical value indicating that fitParCor estimates have the same structure as the Space model. If YY=TRUE, then the fitted and the truth inputs must be symmetric matrices.
tol

A numeric value specifying a lower bound on the tolerance of a non-zero parameter.
verbose

A logical value indicating whether to report the performance to the console.

Value

A numeric, named vector where: (X,Y) is the joint edge performance of X-Y and Y-Y edges.

  • powerJoint power on (X,Y)

  • fdrJoint false discovery rate (FDR) on (X,Y)

  • powerXYPower of X-Y edges

  • fdrXYFDR of X-Y edges

  • powerYYPower of Y-Y edges

  • fdrYYFDR of Y-Y edges

  • tpTrue positives of (X,Y)

  • fnFalse negatives of (X,Y)

  • fpFalse positives of (X,Y)

  • tpXYTrue positives of X-Y

  • fnXYFalse negatives of X-Y

  • fpXYFalse positives of X-Y

  • tpYYTrue positives of Y-Y

  • fnYYFalse negatives of Y-Y

  • fpYYFalse positives of Y-Y

Contents

  • Value
